reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 651/93: COMPOSITION OF STATUTORY COMMITTEE
reg_info.act_under: Dental Technology Act, 1991   Loi de 1991 sur les technologues dentaires

content.content: 1. (1) The Executive Committee shall be composed of, (a) the President or Vice-President of the Council as determined by the by-laws of the College; (b) two members of the Council who are members of the College; and (c) two members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council. (2) The President or his or her designate on the Executive Committee shall be the chair of the Executive Committee. O.Reg. 651/93, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. (1) The Executive Committee shall be composed of,

(a) the President or Vice-President of the Council as determined by the by-laws of the College;

(b) two members of the Council who are members of the College; and

(c) two members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council.

(2) The President or his or her designate on the Executive Committee shall be the chair of the Executive Committee. O.Reg. 651/93, s. 1.

content.content: 2.The Registration Committee shall be composed of, (a) two members of the Council who are members of the College; and (b) one member of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council. O.Reg. 651/93, s. 2.
content.raw_html:
2.The Registration Committee shall be composed of,

(a) two members of the Council who are members of the College; and

(b) one member of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council. O.Reg. 651/93, s. 2.

content.content: 3.The Complaints Committee shall be composed of, (a) two members of the Council who are members of the College; (b) one member of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council; and (c) one member of the College who is not a member of the Council. O.Reg. 651/93, s. 3.
content.raw_html:
3.The Complaints Committee shall be composed of,

(a) two members of the Council who are members of the College;

(b) one member of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council; and

(c) one member of the College who is not a member of the Council. O.Reg. 651/93, s. 3.

content.content: 4.The Discipline Committee shall be composed of, (a) two members of the Council who are members of the College; (b) two members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council; and (c) two members of the College who are not members of the Council. O.Reg. 651/93, s. 4.
content.raw_html:
4.The Discipline Committee shall be composed of,

(a) two members of the Council who are members of the College;

(b) two members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council; and

(c) two members of the College who are not members of the Council. O.Reg. 651/93, s. 4.

content.content: 5.The Fitness to Practise Committee shall be composed of, (a) two members of the Council who are members of the College; and (b) one member of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council. O.Reg. 651/93, s. 5.
content.raw_html:
5.The Fitness to Practise Committee shall be composed of,

(a) two members of the Council who are members of the College; and

(b) one member of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council. O.Reg. 651/93, s. 5.

content.content: 6.The Quality Assurance Committee shall be composed of, (a) one member of the Council who is a member of the College; (b) one member of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council; and (c) one member of the College who is not a member of the Council. O.Reg. 651/93, s. 6.
content.raw_html:
6.The Quality Assurance Committee shall be composed of,

(a) one member of the Council who is a member of the College;

(b) one member of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council; and

(c) one member of the College who is not a member of the Council. O.Reg. 651/93, s. 6.

content.content: 7.The Patient Relations Committee shall be composed of, (a) one member of the Council who is a member of the College; and (b) two members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council. O.Reg. 651/93, s. 7.
content.raw_html:
7.The Patient Relations Committee shall be composed of,

(a) one member of the Council who is a member of the College; and

(b) two members of the Council appointed to the Council by the Lieutenant Governor in Council. O.Reg. 651/93, s. 7.
